detail_desc: Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back, gathered shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and tie detail at the front. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and long trumpet sleeves. Partly lined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a hole-patterned flounce at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a gold-coloured appliqué.
Flip-flops with straps in imitation patent leather. Imitation leather insoles and sturdy, fluted soles.
Short skater skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist that are thinner at the top and more opaque at the bottom giving them the appearance of over-the-knee socks.

Waterproof trainers in mesh with imitation leather details. Padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a contrasting colour grosgrain loop at the back. Reflective details. Linings and moulded insoles in mesh.
Four pairs of earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from approx. 3.8 cm to 5 cm.
Wide jersey vest top with a rounded hem.
Trainers in imitation suede with decorative elasticated lacing, a lightly padded edge, zip in the side and loop at the back. Jersey linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted briefs in microfibre with a laser-cut edges, a lined gusset and string back. The briefs have a light sculpting effect on the tummy, waist and hips.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Imitation suede mules with a wide, V-shaped strap over the foot, open toes and covered block heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 5.5 cm. The polyester content of the sandals is partly recycled.
Short shorts in soft stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with long raglan sleeves and a wrapover, jersey-lined funnel collar with a drawstring. Kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Short, pleated circular skirt in woven fabric with a high, smocked waist and decorative drawstring. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Tie-hem top in cotton jersey with a motif.
Short, fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a round neck and short sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Jumper in a soft knit with hole-knit sections. Boxy fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dungaree dress in stretch cotton twill with adjustable straps that join at the back. Metal fasteners on the straps, front pockets and press-studs at the sides.

Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a moss-stitched front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Bomber jacket in mesh with reversible sequins.Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Soft-lined boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front and two horizontal straps with metal buckles at the top. Zip in one side to make it easy to put on and remove the boots. Velour linings and insoles, and chunky, fluted soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Narrow belt in textured-patterned leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.7 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with embroidery and a pompom trim at the top. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Boxy-stye top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Unlined hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.

Calf-length chiffon dress with a grandad collar, buttons at the top and long, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and lower down the skirt. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying jersey with a mesh back, mesh shoulder straps and a racer back with an elastic strap.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a lined front, racer back in ventilating mesh and a wide elasticated hem. Medium support.

Straight-cut, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders. Covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons. Unlined.
All-in-one suit in patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood with appliqués. Zip down the front and along one leg and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Striped T-shirt in cotton jersey.

LIMITED EDITION. Straight, jacquard-weave tunic in a viscose and cotton blend with a glittery thread pattern. High-cut neckline with a grandad collar, an opening at the top with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, short sleeves and a pleat at the back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
One-shoulder top in cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and patch front pockets.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck top in viscose jersey with gathered side seams for best fit.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in thermal fleece made partly from recycled polyester. Jacket with raglan sleeves, a jersey-lined hood with appliqués, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and trims at the cuffs and hem. Patterned trousers with covered elastication at the waist and trims at the hems.
Fitted, knee-length skirt in soft imitation leather with a high waist and press-studs and a concealed zip at one side. Seam with a flounce at the hem. Recycled polyester lining.
Calf-length dress in stretch, ribbed jersey with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and buttons at the front that are decorative apart from the four lowest ones. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, smocked sides and high cut at the back.
Metal earrings in various designs, one pair of studs and seven pairs of hoops. The studs and one pair of hoops are decorated with rhinestones. Length from 0.8 cm to 3 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Earmuffs in faux fur with an imitation leather headband.
Hi-tops in mesh with imitation leather details, an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Fleece-lined tube scarf in jersey with a text print.

LIMITED EDITION. Calf-length dress in satin with a sheen in a loose fit at the top with a V-neck and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Concealed zip at the back, long dolman sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs, an inset panel at the waist and a skirt with pleats at the top to create soft draping. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Loafers in imitation leather. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 2 cm.
Bra with self-adhesive cups and no shoulder straps or back making it perfect for wearing under strapless or backless garments. Front fastening. Can be washed and reused.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front, ribbing around the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Small fabric shoulder bag with a zip and adjustable shoulder strap at the top and a zipped outer compartment. Lined. Size 4x10x14 cm.
Double-breasted jacket in soft faux fur with notch lapels, dropped shoulders and side pockets. Lined.

Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening at the back with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an organza flounce on the inside of the shoulders to create a puff effect, and cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.
Short, wide dress in a soft viscose weave. Small stand-up collar with gathers to create a gentle drape, buttons at the back and raglan balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short, straight-cut parka in a soft viscose weave with a lined, drawstring hood that has a folded zigzag trim at the front. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Shoulder tabs, long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-studs at the cuffs, and flap front pockets. Lined.

Wide, straight-cut shirt jacket in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Ballet pumps with scalloped edges. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and rounded hem.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and short cap sleeves.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Shorts in lightweight, printed cotton sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Straight-style shirt in a softly draping Tencel™ lyocell weave with a button-down collar, French front, open chest pocket and gently tapered waist. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Calf-length dress in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and a wrapover skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Trenchcoat in soft, stretch imitation suede with a small stand-up collar, decorative shoulder tabs and draped lapels. Loose yoke front and back, a detachable tie belt at the waist and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Push-up bras in cotton jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky polyurethane soles.

Short dress in washed denim made from Tencel™ lyocell with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and flap chest pockets with a concealed button. Long sleeves with a tab and button, a detachable tie belt at the waist and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
